verses.verse: And the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> came upon Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Oded <WH5752>:

and he went out <WH3318> to meet <WH6440> Asa <WH609>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH8085>, Hear ye me <WH609>, Asa, and all Judah <WH3063> and Benjamin <WH1144>: Jehovah <WH3068> is with you <WH1875>, while ye are with him; and if ye seek him <WH4672>, he will be found of you <WH5800>; but if ye forsake him <WH5800>, he will forsake you.
Now for a long <WH7227> season <WH3117> Israel <WH3478> was without <WH3808> the true <WH571> God <WH430>, and without a teaching <WH3384> priest <WH3548>, and without law <WH8451>:
But when in their distress <WH6862> they turned <WH7725> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, and sought <WH1245> him <WH4672>, he was found of them.

And in those times <WH6256> there was no peace <WH7965> to him that went out <WH3318>, nor to him that came in <WH935>; but great <WH7227> vexations <WH4103> were upon all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the lands <WH776>.
And they were broken <WH3807> in pieces <WH1471>, nation against nation <WH1471>, and city <WH5892> against city <WH5892>; for God <WH430> did vex <WH2000> them with all adversity <WH6869>.
But be ye strong <WH2388>, and let not your hands <WH3027> be slack <WH7503>; for your work <WH6468> shall be <WH3426> rewarded <WH7939>.

And when Asa <WH609> heard <WH8085> these words <WH1697>, and the prophecy <WH5016> of Oded <WH5752> the prophet <WH5030>, he took courage <WH2388>, and put away <WH5674> the abominations <WH8251> out of all the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063> and Benjamin <WH1144>, and out of the cities <WH5892> which he had taken <WH3920> from the hill-country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669>; and he renewed <WH2318> the altar <WH4196> of Jehovah <WH3068>, that was before <WH6440> the porch <WH197> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And he gathered <WH6908> all Judah <WH3063> and Benjamin <WH1144>, and them that sojourned <WH1481> with them out of Ephraim <WH669> and Manasseh <WH4519>, and out of Simeon <WH8095>: for they fell <WH5307> to him out of Israel <WH3478> in abundance <WH7230>, when they saw <WH7200> that Jehovah <WH3068> his God was with him <WH430>.
So they gathered themselves together <WH6908> at Jerusalem <WH3389> in the third <WH7992> month <WH2320>, in the fifteenth <WH2568> year <WH8141> of the reign <WH4438> of Asa <WH609>.

And they sacrificed <WH2076> unto Jehovah <WH3068> in that day <WH3117>, of the spoil <WH7998> which they had brought <WH935>, seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> oxen <WH1241> and seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> sheep <WH6629>.
And they entered <WH935> into the covenant <WH1285> to seek <WH1875> Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of their fathers <WH1>, with all their heart <WH3824> and with all their soul <WH5315>;

and that whosoever would not seek <WH1875> Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>, should be put to death <WH4191>, whether <WH4480> small <WH6996> or great <WH1419>, whether man <WH376> or woman <WH802>.
And they sware <WH7650> unto Jehovah <WH3068> with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963>, and with shouting <WH8643>, and with trumpets <WH2689>, and with cornets <WH7782>.

And all Judah <WH3063> rejoiced <WH8055> at the oath <WH7621>; for they had sworn <WH7650> with all their heart <WH3824>, and sought <WH1245> him with their whole desire <WH7522>; and he was found <WH4672> of them <WH3068>: and Jehovah gave them rest <WH5117> round about <WH5439>.

And also Maacah <WH4601>, the mother <WH517> of Asa <WH609> the king <WH4428>, he removed <WH5493> from being queen <WH1377>, because she had made <WH6213> an abominable image <WH4656> for an Asherah <WH842>; and Asa <WH609> cut down <WH3772> her image <WH4656>, and made dust <WH1854> of it <WH8313>, and burnt it at the brook <WH5158> Kidron <WH6939>.
But the high places <WH1116> were not taken away <WH5493> out of Israel <WH3478>: nevertheless the heart <WH3824> of Asa <WH609> was perfect <WH8003> all his days <WH3117>.

And he brought <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of God <WH430> the things that his father <WH1> had dedicated <WH6944>, and that he himself had dedicated <WH6944>, silver <WH3701>, and gold <WH2091>, and vessels <WH3627>.
And there was no more war <WH4421> unto the five <WH2568> and thirtieth <WH7970> year <WH8141> of the reign <WH4438> of Asa <WH609>.
